org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.asn1.coer

Class COEREncodeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.asn1.coer.COEREncodeHelper

  • public class COEREncodeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing help methods for encoding lengt determinant and enumeration values.

    For more information see ISO/IEC 8825-7:2015 Sections 8.6 and 11.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

        public static void writeLengthDeterminant(java.math.BigInteger length,
                                          java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Returns an encoded length determinant according to section 8.6 in the ISO/IEC 8825-7:2015 specification
        Parameters:
        length - the length to encode
        dos - the output stream to write the length determinant to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.io.IOException

      • encode

        public static byte[] encode(COEREncodable encodable)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Help method to encode a COEREncodable to byte array.
        Parameters:
        encodable - the COEREncodable to encode.
        Returns:
        related byte array.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problems occurred encoding the object.

      • decode

        public static COEREncodable decode(COEREncodable newObject,
                                   byte[] data)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Help method to decode a COEREncodable from byte array.
        Parameters:
        newObject - a new COEREncodable created with the empty constructor.
        data - the data to decode.
        Returns:
        given object populated with decoded data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problems occurred decoding the object.
